name: Oceanic Mimic: Frog
description:
When your active character takes DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 1.
Usage(s): 2. When the Usages are depleted, this card will not be discarded.
At the End Phase, if Usage(s) have been depleted: Discard this card to deal 2 Hydro DMG.
